assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Atypical_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_Initial_First_Presentation_of_Recurrent_Q7
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: e) Pre-eclampsia, HELLP syndrome, pregnancy-related TTP: provide pregnancy test results in all women of child bearing age a. If the patient was pregnant, a detailed explanation must be provided justifying why this was not TMA secondary to pregnancy
